ygData.subject: Intensify Death. (question with a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I attempted to research Intensify Death last night twice. The recipe book says Word of Refuge, sentient, absorption. When I hit combine. These items do not
ygData.messageBody:
I attempted to research Intensify Death last night twice.

The recipe book says Word of Refuge, sentient, absorption.

When I hit combine.

"These items do not combine in these quantities to produce
anything."

Now before you say "Did you put in only one of them, or you
have the right ones?"

I tried it twice, and triple checked the items.

For those of you about to say You need a pen and
parchment...you don't.

Anyone know where this spell is sold, or where the heck to
get a hold of a GM that knows anything?
